actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to increase the membership of the Civil Service Commission from three to five.

summary.text: Increases the number of members of the Civil Service Commission from three to five. Empowers the Commissioners, rather than the Chairman, to appoint the Executive Director of the Commission.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to increase the membership of the Civil Service Commission from three to five.
